remarks: Founded Induction schema, using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 7-Feb-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2016.)
statement:
frins2fg.1 $e |- ( y e. A -> ( A. z e. Pred ( R , A , y ) ps -> ph ) ) $.
frins2fg.2 $e |- F/ y ps $.
frins2fg.3 $e |- ( y = z -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
frins2fg $p |- ( ( R Fr A /\ R Se A ) -> A. y e. A ph ) $.
$d A y z $.
$d R y z $.
$d ph z $.
